lyrics:
Love Is Perverse
(Words and Music by Bruce Neilsen)

When I want you
You seem so far away
Now that you’re near
I wish you’d disappear

For you were more precious
When you were out of reach
When you get too close babe
I can hardly speak

Love is perverse
It could be worse
It could all end
So stay a friend

Love is perverse
It could be worse
It could all end
So stay a friend

Love is perverse
Love is perverse
Love is perverse
Love is perverse

When I see your phony smile
I feel sick inside
I’d rather see you dead
Than take me for a ride

Sometimes my feelings change
And I reach out to you
Sometimes I get so bored
You have to do

Love is perverse
It could be worse
It could all end
So stay a friend

Love is perverse
It could be worse
It could all end
So stay a friend

Love is perverse
Love is perverse
Love is perverse
Love is perverse
